data.title: Vinod Khosla is looking at this metric to gauge if we're in an AI bubble
data.description: "What Wall Street tends to do with it, I don't really care," Khosla said.
data.content:
Vinod Khosla has his eye on one AI metric, and it's not stock prices.

data.author: Reuters
data.title: Silver hits record high as US-EU crisis over Greenland simmers
data.description: The US’s aggression toward its NATO allies has rattled markets, buoying demand for havens and reviving the ‘Sell America’ trade
data.content:
Silver hit a record high and gold traded near an all-time peak as President Donald Trumps push to take over Greenland fueled fears of a US-Europe trade war and kept markets on edge.
